trigger: Lowest CO2 intensity in the electricity
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the CO2 intensity in the electricity production is lowest between a starting time and a finish time and for a duration specified by you.
This trigger fires when the electricity price is lowest between a starting time and a finish time and for a duration specified by you.

trigger: Highest CO2 intensity in the electricity
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the CO2 intensity in the electricity production is highest between a starting time and a finish time and for a duration specified by you.
This trigger fires when the electricity price is highest between a starting time and a finish time and for a duration specified by you.
